items.name: card-form
items.title: Card Form
items.description: A credit card payment form with card number, expiry date, CVV, and cardholder name fields.

items.name: pay-confirm
items.title: Pay Confirm
items.description: A payment confirmation block displaying amount, card details, and confirm/cancel actions.

items.name: order-summary
items.title: Order Summary
items.description: An order summary block displaying items, subtotal, shipping, tax, discounts, and total.

items.name: saved-cards
items.title: Saved Cards
items.description: A card selector for choosing a saved payment method with support for multiple card brands.

items.name: payment-success
items.title: Payment Success
items.description: A payment confirmation screen showing order details, delivery info, and tracking options.

items.name: bank-card-form
items.title: Bank Card Form
items.description: Compact bank card payment form with inline layout for chat interfaces.

items.name: payment-methods
items.title: Payment Methods
items.description: Payment method selector with card brands (Visa, Mastercard, CB, Amex) and Apple Pay.

items.name: order-confirm
items.title: Order Confirm
items.description: Order confirmation with product image, delivery info, and confirm action.

items.name: payment-success
items.title: Payment Success
items.description: Payment success with order details, brand logo, and tracking button.

items.name: payment-confirmed
items.title: Payment Confirmed
items.description: Payment confirmation card with product image, price, delivery info, and tracking button.

items.name: product-list
items.title: Product List
items.description: Product list with list, grid, carousel, and picker variants.

items.name: option-list
items.title: Option List
items.description: Tag-style option selector with single or multiple selection modes.

items.name: amount-input
items.title: Amount Input
items.description: Amount input with increment/decrement buttons and preset values.

items.name: tag-select
items.title: Tag Select
items.description: Colored tag selector with single or multiple selection and color variants.

items.name: quick-reply
items.title: Quick Reply
items.description: Quick reply buttons for common chat responses.

items.name: progress-steps
items.title: Progress Steps
items.description: Progress indicator with horizontal or vertical layout and step statuses.

items.name: status-badge
items.title: Status Badge
items.description: Status badge with multiple states (success, pending, processing, error, shipped, delivered).

items.name: stats
items.title: Stats
items.description: Scrollable stat cards with values, trends, and change indicators.

items.name: skeleton
items.title: Skeleton Loaders
items.description: Skeleton placeholder components with pulse animation for loading states.

items.name: post-card
items.title: Post Card
items.description: Post card with image, title, excerpt, author info and read more button. Supports default, compact, horizontal, and covered variants. Includes post-detail for fullscreen view.

items.name: post-list
items.title: Post List
items.description: Post list with list, grid, and carousel variants. Includes post-detail for fullscreen view.

items.name: post-detail
items.title: Post Detail
items.description: Full post view with cover image, author info, content, tags and related posts section.

items.name: table
items.title: Table
items.description: Data table with optional single or multi-select modes for chat interfaces.

items.name: message-bubble
items.title: Message Bubble
items.description: Chat message bubbles with text, image, voice, and reaction variants.

items.name: chat-conversation
items.title: Chat Conversation
items.description: Full chat conversation component with multiple message types.

items.name: x-post
items.title: X Post
items.description: X (Twitter) post card with engagement metrics.

items.name: instagram-post
items.title: Instagram Post
items.description: Instagram post card with image and engagement.

items.name: linkedin-post
items.title: LinkedIn Post
items.description: LinkedIn post card with professional styling.

items.name: youtube-post
items.title: YouTube Post
items.description: YouTube video card with playable embed.

items.name: map-carousel
items.title: Map Carousel
items.description: Interactive map with location markers and a draggable carousel of cards.
